items.title: Baking
items.description: Baking is a bit differnt beast from cooking. Cooking is art, but baking is more of a science.

items.title: Description
items.description: Maqlouba means upside down in Arabic. It is quite easy to work with.  Actually, quite an easy dish to make for a lot of people, I might have spent around and hour maybe 90 minutes on it.

items.title: Equipment
items.description: In this article, I list the most important tools I use in the kitchen.  My philosophy for tools can be found in the tools section [[Tools]]

items.title: Food
items.description: One of the most important and fun aspects of cooking is the ability to explore outside of a set recipe. This exploration phase is what makes cooks great. Here is a list of questions for the aspiring cook.

items.title: Philosophy
items.description: I think following recipes automatically is a sign of an unimaginative mind, and as such one should try to experiment and expand the palette. I have structured my favorite and interesting recipes as a dynamic document with my thoughts and musing on the recipes. I want to be able to continuously update my recipes with more interesting
